pages.text: The syrup can also be fermented to produce an alcoholic drink.
A number of species of cacti have been shown to contain psychoactive agents, chemical compounds that can cause changes in mood, perception and cognition through their effects on the brain.
The tumbleweed dispersal strategies are unusual among plants; most species disperse their seeds by other mechanisms.
Roses are best known as ornamental plants grown for their flowers in the garden and sometimes indoors.
Rose hips are after the removal of the irritant hairs, edible raw, and occasionally are made into jam, jelly, marmalade, and soup, or brewed for tea.
Stories tell of a princess trapped in a castle who managed to lift a curse before a frozen rose melted...
Lilacs are popular shrubs in parks and gardens throughout the temperate zone, and several hybrids and numerous cultivars have been developed.
Ancient texts mention the peony was used for flavoring food.
An area of cultivated shrubs in a park or a garden is known as a shrubbery.
An area of cultivated shrubs in a park or a garden is known as a shrubbery.
This herbaceous perennial is often short-lived.
The tiny, dark evergreen foliage and spreading,makes it an excellent ground cover for sun to part shade in gardens with moist, acidic soils.
Owing to its fine grain it is a good wood for fine wood carving, although this is limited by the small sizes available.

Herbs have a variety of uses including culinary, medicinal, aromatic and in some cases, spiritual.
Typically a taproot is somewhat straight and very thick, is tapering in shape, and grows directly downward.
A weeping willow is a popular ornamental tree and is also grown for wood production and shelterbelts.
It is found in freshwater and brackish wetland communities, in pools, swamps and the margins of streams, where it grows to about 20 cm in height.
They are safe to eat in small amounts for those with no oxalate-related conditions.
Crocus has a long history of use in traditional medicine. It has also been used as a fabric dye.
The entire plant, including the leaves, stems, flowers, and roots, is edible and nutritious.
As an aromatic, it has a sweet fragrance with lemon or citrus notes. It is used as a spice or condiment in pastas, salads and dressings, and desserts.
Their buds and greens are used in teas, and their buds, processed by bees, are the essential ingredient of a monofloral honey.
Dacopa, an intense mocha-tasting extract from the roasted tubers, is used to flavor beverages.
Species of this plant have been used in traditional medicine for over 2,000 years, and are one of the most widely used medicines today.
A fancy looking plant...
There is a persistent piece of folklore that hoyas prefer to be potbound - kept in a small pot. It is said that this will hasten flowering.
Ferns figure in folklore, for example in legends about mythical flowers or seeds.
In botany, a plant shoot consists of any plant stem together with its appendages like leaves, lateral buds, flowering stems, and flower buds.
Before the plant flowers, the tender inside of the shoots can be squeezed out and eaten raw or cooked.
Apple trees are typically 4–12 metres (13–39 feet) talI at maturity, with a dense, twiggy crown.
Applewood gives off a pleasant scent when burned, and smoke from an applewood fire gives an excellent flavour to smoked foods.
It is easier to cut when green; dry applewood is exceedingly difficult to carve by hand.
